content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Assets at Risk The Assets at Risk widget offers a high-level summary of at-risk cloud assets within your organization, organized by asset type. From this widget, you can: Expand your view: Click the View more link to access the Attack Surface Discovery page. Asset type details: Click the link for any asset type to see a detailed list of at-risk assets in the Attack Surface Discovery page. Â© 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated.
